column4: help needed: when i boot using ubuntu live CD, it loads up, and then monitor goes in sleep mode. i can still use the menus and hear clicks on using the mouse and kbd. is it due to lack of drivers for monitor? same thing happ with mandarke.
monitor's model is LG Studioworks 44i. pretty popular. so i guess the drivers would've been included with CD. but why does it go dark then?
would graphic card hav any sort of issues? its gef2. can't pinpoint the exact prob
have you tried turning off the xdmcp or whatever it is?
